mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_USER( id, us_code, us_name, us_birth, us_phone, us_position, us_email, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{usCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usBirth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

INSERT INTO T_USER( id, us_code, us_name, us_birth, us_phone, us_position, us_email, create_time, update_time ) VALUES
( #{tUser.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tUser.usCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tUser.usName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tUser.usBirth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tUser.usPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tUser.usPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tUser.usEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tUser.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tUser.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_USER SET id = #{id}, us_code = #{usCode}, us_name = #{usName}, us_birth = #{usBirth}, us_phone = #{usPhone}, us_position = #{usPosition}, us_email = #{usEmail}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
